room_title: Escape room "Wizard School" by Escape Room Vail in Avon
room_address: 2111 N Frontage Rd W SUITE E Vail, CO 81657
room_description: Vail’s newest room! You and your group are students of Vail’s Wizard School. School is not in session, but you just received an alert that there is a large troll ransacking the town of Vail. You know that trolls love eating magical owls so you and your crew are breaking into the school to save the school pet owl. Can you break into the school, find your beloved owl and escape in time?
